title: Type and Design things to see in Cuba
content:
Hello,

Heading to Cuba for the coming holidays and would like to discover cuban design. Any suggestions of places to visit?

thx!

 [‹ Why you like type.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906164411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15824 "Go to previous forum topic") [Multi-script Merry Christmas ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906164411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16473 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Martin LAllier

comments.content: You might ask Pablo Medina of [Cubanica](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906164411/http:/www.cubanica.com/) who designed several fonts based on what he saw during visits to the country.
